p.profile: I am a person who likes web development from the moment I started my professional practice, learning more and more about programming every day.

proyect-01.title: Tenis-up / Professional Practice
proyect-01.description: Application for tennis players where they can find players, courts and tournaments related to tennis in their city or country with a mobile application and a website. Idea created by Johann Westphal founder of Westphal Soluciones Tecnologicas Spa.

proyect-02.title: P&C Connected / FrontEnd
proyect-02.description: P&C Connected is a Human Resources Outsourcing company in Chile that aims to support the management of their human capital. Website developed as a prototype to be presented to the company and to be used for commercial use.

proyect-03.title: Axiom Data / FrontEnd y Backend
proyect-03.description: Project developed for the company Hidro MFD seeking to solve the shortcomings in terms of analysis of work orders carried out in this same company.

proyect-04.title: Pokedex / Own project
proyect-04.description: Own Pokedex consuming the information from the PokeApi for searching any Pokemon, filtering by type and a more general view of their characteristics.
